scripts.install-all-deps: npm i && concurrently "npm run server-install" "npm run client-install"
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development && concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run start"
scripts.rebuild-prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production && concurrently "cd server && npm run start" "cd client && npm run rebuild-prod"
scripts.prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production && concurrently "cd server && npm run start" "cd client && npm run prod"
